Condor::

"That could be dangerous for you, Rage"replied Condor"Megatron isn't 
fool and the other preds neither; if they discover your plans the 
would kill you... Moreover, maximal doesn't kill unless they haven't 
other choice, that's one of the things that you should learn if you 
whant join us"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Hottie4u2have1@a... wrote:
> Rage:Well Condor I never thought of the fact I could join the 
Maximals but 
> there was a bot who intended on killing all preds.Maybe I could 
join you 
> ......unless I could destroy Megatron and act like an undercover 
Maximal.
